result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:31 PM Defendant Miguel A. Mendez-Desiderio in court.  Attorney Brandon J Zegiel in court for Miguel A. Mendez-Desiderio.  Attorney Alexandra Kathleen Smathers in court for State of Wisconsin. Certified Court Interpreter, Ruth Garcia, appears in court - sworn.  Clerk HM.   No resolved.  Pretrial motions filed. Issue re: playing video. Trial scheduled. STC  scheduled - deadline for notice of experts and request for use of videotaped statements.  No objections. STC 12/15 2pm.  Bond continued.  By 12/2/22, DE shall file any notice of intent to use expert testimony/identifying info.
Jury status hearing scheduled for January 26, 2023 at 11:00 am.
Jury selection scheduled for January 30, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 31, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery
if Intent to Use a Videotaped Statement at the Trial

Attorney James Kraus appeared for the State by zoom.   Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorneys Zegiel and Cabranes. Court interpreter Ruth Garcia appears, sworn.    Clerk HMcBride.  DE withdraws demand for speedy trial.  Atty Cabranes requests ajdmt to consult expert. Granted.  PTC 10/10 2:30pm.  Bond continued.

Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order completed and given to Attorney.  Atty requests speedy trial orally today.   Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 1st, 2022 at 1:30pm
